content.raw:
Looking at the rotation of front and rear wheels it looks like the front wheels are trying to rotate forward while the rear wheels are a mix of blocking and rotating backwards with the rear left wheel tending to block a little more often than the rear right wheel which then seems to result in the drifting motion with a large rotational component: 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WFOy24vdfrk

The vehicle plugin is running, mu = mu2 = 1.0, and max_vel = 100 for the wheels.
